message.content: We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. The symptoms suggest allergic rhinitis, and Desloratadine is a second-generation antihistamine commonly used to treat allergic rhinitis. Theophylline is a bronchodilator, Nizatidine is a histamine H2 receptor antagonist used to treat ulcers, and Amoxicillin is an antibiotic used for bacterial infections, none of which are appropriate for allergic rhinitis.
